me: My name is Krzysztof Olipra. I'm a full-stack developer who specializes in designing complex web applications.
currently: Currently, I am a second year student in Information Technology and Econometrics (AGH).
history: I've been coding since high school, but recently it truly became my passion. My whole life I have always been keen on self-improvement, and thus I feel like programming has been made for me. There is always something new to learn, room for improvement and new challenges every day.

skills.iKnowDescription: I am pretty confident with abilities in these technologies. I have worked with them in the past and have proven experience.
skills.imLearningDescription: I might know some of them pretty well, but im not work-confident in them.
